title: dingir:SCP-076
content:

[[=]]
++ アベル
[[/=]]

------

cul me,,3,,^^!^^-ka cul /me,,3,,\-ka en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
en ^^d^^gilgamec,,2,, cul me,,3,,-ka en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
a,,2,,-/ur,,2,, sag,,9,,\-sag,,9,, cul me,,3,,-/ka\ en-du-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,
en TUR /kalag\-kalag-ga cul me,,3,,-ka en-/du\-ni ga-an-dug,,4,,

[[>]]
//ギルガメシュ叙事詩//[[footnote]]
**I will sing the song of the man of battle, the man of battle. I will sing the song of Lord Gilgameš, the man of battle, I will sing the song of him with the well-proportioned limbs, the man of battle. I will sing the song of the mighty ... lord, the man of battle.**

英訳は[http://etcsl.orinst.ox.ac.uk/cgi-bin/etcsl.cgi?text=c.1.8.1.2&display=Crit&charenc=&lineid=c1812.1.A.1 The Erectronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature]より引用。

© Copyright 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006 The ETCSL project,
Faculty of Oriental Studies, University of Oxford
Updated 2016-11-30 by RC
[[/footnote]]
[[/>]]
